title: A Family Affair
itunes:title: A Family Affair
description:
I have been in a committed relationship with my boyfriend for 3 years and it is great, but I am starting to get extremely bored in the bedroom. So, a couple of months ago, I poured my heart out to my boyfriend's sister and she truly understood what I was going through.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
